name: Nameless Education Platform
body:
## Projects

The platform is divided into multiple projects.

### [NEP Core](https://github.com/nepteam/nep)

NEP Core is the core module providing the security, the basic messaging layer and the basic data management.

### [Automation](https://github.com/nepteam/automation)

The automation project is to provide the automatic environment setup with Puppet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
